When investigating (either locally or on CI) it's just easy to add the trace logging for the container and then the assertion printing the id is useful. When such information is available I don't consider it as no interest to anyone. If the test fails it's important to anyone searching for the cause.

replies.bodyText: Well the interesting point of the assertion is that it failed because the the LRA is in the wrong state. The point of unit tests is to detect regressions so that an engineer can be assigned to fix it (the actual value is not of interest). If you want this kind of information then we need to add trace logging into the test suite.
